document.full_text: for americans looking to understand libya, scene of a bloody revolt and the latest u.s. military campaign, the writer and poet khaled mattawa has become an unlikely guide.
document.title: libyan-american poet drops caution, speaks out
lines_and_colors: for americans looking to understand libya, scene of a bloody revolt and the latest u.s. military campaign, the writer and poet khaled mattawa has become an unlikely guide.
